edu.jhu.coe.PCFGLA
Class LatentStatistics

java.lang.Object
  edu.jhu.coe.PCFGLA.LatentStatistics

public class LatentStatistics
extends Object

LatentStatistics calculates symbol, fragment and fragment composition counts for a corpus.

Author:
Frank Ferraro
